td.content: s:pt c/o 8 days h/o severe nausea (not checked), severe malaise, severe intermittent headache accompanied with light flashes in the right visual field. she is a 63 YO white female. she has approx. a 30 pack/year history of smoking Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol o:Height 61 in, Weight 205 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16 a:Migraine Headaches p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

s:a white f aged 63 yrs presents with progressive severe malaise, severe intermittent headache accompanied with light flashes in the right visual field, severe nausea and Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat for past 10 days. Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol she has approx. a 30 pack/year history of smoking o:Height 61 in, Weight 208 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 16 a:Migraine Headaches p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered MRA Brain.

s:63 yr old white f presents with 3 years history of severe malaise, severe nausea. pt reports severe intermittent headache accompanied with light flashes in the right visual field. pt reports that she smokes once or twice daily Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol o:Height 60 in, Weight 203 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15 a:Migraine Headaches p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.
